author: yetkinyilmaz
body:
Running pdigi_hi for Hydjet samples so that the input for the heavyIon object is produced which is (CrossingFrame<HepMCProduct>) by the same module in both embedded and non-embedded HI workflows.

pdigi_hi is added, and the relval workflows adjusted accordingly.

Tested workflows: 140, 145, 300, 140.53, in addition to those in runTheMatrix.py -s

Needed for RelVals, and especially needed for the release for MC DIGI campaign.
title: Fix for heavyIon object in both embedded and non-emb. HI samples
